Test Name: Hepatitis B Virus E Antigen (HBeAg) and Hepatitis B Virus E Antibody (HBeAb)
Purpose: To accurately detect and report Hepatitis B virus E antigen and E antibody levels in serum for diagnosis and monitoring of infection.
Container: Serum separator tube (SST) preferred; red-top tube acceptable
Equipment: Centrifuge, pipettes, microplate reader or chemiluminescence analyzer, timer
